pricing.faq_upgrade: How do I upgrade to Premium?
pricing.faq_upgrade_answer: After installing the free extension, click the 'Upgrade' button in the sidebar.
pricing.faq_billing: Can I switch between monthly and yearly billing?
pricing.faq_billing_answer: Yes! You can switch your billing cycle at any time.
pricing.faq_limit: What happens if I reach the limit?
pricing.faq_limit_answer: You'll see a friendly prompt encouraging you to upgrade.
